DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore therapeutic effect mechanism transcranial magnetic stimulation ( rTMS ) treatment tardive dyskinesia .
DOC.brief_title: Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation Treatment Tardive Dyskinesia .
DOC.criteria: The diagnosis schizophrenia accord DSMIV； At least two item Abnormal Involuntary Movement Scale（AIMS） must 2 point high symptom Parkinson，tourette 's syndrome , huntington disease Signed informed consent rTMS contraindication : intracranial metal substance , heart pacemaker cochlear implant , intracranial pressure patient diagnose accord DSMIV substance abuse , development delay current treatment anticonvulsant act drug anticonvulsant , benzodiazepine Acute risk suicide impulse history epileptic seizure presence epileptic activity document basis EEG pregnant lactant woman
